name: The Reef Experience
description:
The Reef Experience is an underwater exploration game designed completely from scratch by Julian and Jason. It is heavily focused on the visuals, realistic physics, and audio, making it an impressive showcase style game with playability as an added bonus. Each and every one of the dozens of unique sprites and animations were specifically designed by the developers.

In The Reef Experience, you can explore the depths of the ocean and come across several marine animals. Have a relaxing, enjoyable experience in The Reef Experience. As a side note, a couple of animals may or may not be dangerous.

Julian and Jason are not responsible for post traumatic stress disorder or any sudden development in aquaphobia in players who completed the game.
